Verses: 1 seeriyaavin Raajaavaagiya Benaadhaath Than Senaiyaiyellaam Koottikkondu Poi, Samaariyaavai Mutrikkaipottu Adhinmel Yuththampanninaan; Avanodekooda Muppaththirandu Raajaakkal Irundhadhumallaamal, Kudhiraigalum Radhangalum Irundhadhu.
2 avan Nagaraththirkul Isravelin Raajaavaagiya Aagaabidaththil Sthaanaapadhigalai Anuppi:

3 unnudaiya Velliyum Unnudaiya Ponnum Ennudaiyadhu; Unnudaiya Sthreegalum Unnudaiya Kumaararukkul Samarththaraayirukkiravargalum Ennudaiyavargal Endru Benaadhaadh Sollugiraan Endru Avanukku Solla Sonnaan.
4 isravelin Raajaa Adharkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Raajaavaagiya En Aandavane, Ummudaiya Vaarththaiyinpadiye, Naanum Enakku Undaana Yaavum Ummudaiyavaigaldhaan Endru Solliyanuppinaan.

5 andha Sthaanaapadhigal Thirumbavum Vandhu: Benaadhaadh Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal, Un Velliyaiyum, Un Ponnaiyum, Un Sthreegalaiyum, Un Kumaarargalaiyum Nee Enakkuk Kodukkavendum Endru Umakku Solliyanuppinene.

6 aanaalum Naalai Inneraththil En Oozhiyakkaararai Unnidaththil Anuppuven; Avargal Un Veettaiyum Un Oozhiyakkaararin Veedugalaiyum Sodhiththu, Un Kannukkup Piriyamaanavaigal Ellaavatraiyum Thangal Kaigalil Eduththukkondupovaargal Endraar Endru Sonnaargal.

7 appozhudhu Isravelin Raajaa, Dhesaththin Moopparaiyellaam Azhaippiththu: Ivan Pollaapputh Thedugira Vidhaththaik Gavaniththuppaarungal; En Sthreegalaiyum, En Kumaarargalaiyum, En Velliyaiyum, En Ponnaiyum Ketka, Ivan Ennidaththil Aal Anuppinapodhu, Naan Kodukkamaatten Endru Ivanukku Marukkavillaiye Endraan.
8 appozhudhu Sagala Moopparum Sagala Janangalum Avanaip Paarththu: Neer Avanukku Sevikodukkavum, Avanukku Sammadhikkavum Vendaam Endraargal.

9 adhinaal Avan Benaadhaaththin Sthaanaapadhigalai Nokki: Neengal Raajaavaagiya En Aandavanukku Sollavendiyadhu Ennavendraal, Neer Mudhal Visai Umadhu Adiyaanukku Solliyanuppina Yaavum Seyven; Indhak Kaariyaththaiyo Naan Seyyakkoodaadhu Endru Sollungal Endraan; Sthaanaapadhigal Poi, Indha Marumozhiyai Avanukku Sonnaargal.

10 appozhudhu Benaadhaadh Avanidaththil Aal Anuppi: Enakkup Pin Sellugira Janangal Ellaarum Kaikku Oru Pidiyaavadhu Vaarikkolla Samaariyaavin Thool Podhumaanadhaayirundhaal, Dhevargal Adharku Sariyaagavum Adharku Adhigamaagavum Enakku Seyyakkadavargal Endru Sollachchonnaan.
11 adharku Isravelin Raajaa Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Aayudham Thariththirukkiravan, Aayudham Urindhu Podugiravanaippolap Perumaipaaraattalaagaadhu Endru Avanukku Sollungal Endraan.

12 benaadhaaththum, Matra Raajaakkalum Koodaarangalile Kudiththukkondirukkaiyil, Indha Vaarththaiyaik Kettu, Than Oozhiyakkaararai Nokki: Aayaththam Pannungal Endraan; Appadiye Nagaraththinmel Sandaiseyya Aayaththampanninaargal.

13 appozhudhu Oru Theerkkadharisi Isravelin Raajaavaagiya Aagaabidaththil Vandhu: Andha Eraalamaana Janakkoottaththaiyellaam Kandaayaa? Idho, Naane Karththarendru Nee Ariyumpadi Indraikku Adhai Un Kaiyil Oppukkoduppen Endru Karththar Sollugiraar Endraan.

14 yaaraikkondu Endru Aagaab Kettaan; Adharku Avan: Maagaanangaludaiya Adhipadhigalin Sevagaraik Kondu Endru Karththar Sollugiraar Endraan; Pinbu Avan, Yuththaththai Yaar Thuvakkavendum Endru Kettadharku; Avan, Neerdhaan Endraan.

15 avan Maagaanangaludaiya Adhipadhigalin Sevagarai Lakkam Paarththaan, Avargal Irunootru Muppaththiranduper; Avargalukkuppinbu, Isravel Puththiraraagiya Sagala Janaththin Lakkamum Paarththu Ezhaayiramper Endru Kandaan.

16 avargal Maththiyaanavelaiyile Veliye Purappattaargal; Benaadhaaththum, Avanukku Udhaviyaaga Vandha Muppaththirandu Raajaakkalaagiya Matra Raajaakkalum, Koodaarangalil Kudiththu Verikondirundhaargal.
17 maagaanangaludaiya Adhipadhigalin Sevagar Munthandaagap Purappadugirapodhu, Benaadhaadh Anuppina Manushar: Samaariyaavilirundhu Manushar Purappattu Varugiraargal Endru Avanukku Ariviththaargal.
18 appozhudhu Avan: Avargal Samaadhaanaththirkaagap Purappattuvandhaalum Avargalai Uyirode Pidiyungal; Avargal Yuththaththirkaagap Purappattuvandhaalum Avargalai Uyirode Pidiyungal Endraan.
19 maagaanangaludaiya Adhipadhigalin Sevagaraana Avargalum, Avargal Pinne Varugira Raanuvamum, Nagaraththilirundhu Veliye Vandhapodhu,

20 avargal Avaravar Thangalukku Edhirppadugiravargalai Vettinaargal; Seeriyar Murindhodipponaargal; Isravelar Avargalaith Thuraththinaargal; Seeriyaavin Raajaavaagiya Benaadhaadh, Kudhiraiyin Mel Eri Sila Kudhirai Veerarodunkoodath Thappiyodipponaan.
21 isravelin Raajaa Purappattu, Kudhiraigalaiyum Radhangalaiyum Muriya Adiththu, Seeriyaril Magaa Sangaaram Undaaga Vettinaan.

22 pinbu Andhath Theerkkadharisi Isravelin Raajaavinidaththil Vandhu, Avanai Nokki: Neer Poi Ummaip Palappaduththikkondu, Neer Seyyaththakkadhu Innadhendru Gavaniththuppaarum; Maruvarushaththile Seeriyaavin Raajaa Umakku Virodhamaaga Varuvaan Endraan.

23 seeriyaavin Raajaavudaiya Oozhiyakkaarar Avanaip Paarththu: Avargaludaiya Dhevargal Malaiththevargal, Adhinaal Avargal Nammai Merkondaargal; Naam Avargalode Samaboomiyile Yuththam Panninaal Nalladhu; Appozhudhu Avargalai Merkolvadhu Nichchayam.
24 adharkaaga Neer Seyyavendiyadhu Ennavendraal, Indha Raajaakkal Ovvoruvaraiyum Thangal Sthalaththilirundhu Maatri, Avargalukkup Padhilaaga Senaapadhigalai Erpaduththi;

25 neer Madiyakkoduththa Senaikku Sariyaai Senaiyaiyum, Andhak Kudhiraigalukku Sariyaaik Kudhiraigalaiyum, Radhangalukku Sariyaai Radhangalaiyum Lakkampaarththukkollum; Pirpaadu Samaboomiyile Naam Avargalodu Yuththampanni, Nichchayamaai Avargalai Merkolvom Endraargal; Avan Avargal Sorkettu Appadiye Seydhaan.
26 maruvarushaththile Benaadhaadh Seeriyarai Lakkampaarththu, Isravelodu Yuththampanna Aappekkukku Vandhaan.

27 isravel Puththirarum Lakkam Paarkkappattu, Thevaiyaanadhai Sambaadhiththukkondu, Avargalai Edhirkkap Purappattu, Avargalukku Edhire Irandu Siriya Vellaattuk Kidaigalaippolap Paalayamiranginaargal; Dhesam Seeriyaraal Niraindhirundhadhu.

28 appozhudhu Dhevanudaiya Manushan Oruvan Vandhu, Isravelin Raajaavaip Paarththu: Karththar Pallaththaakkugalin Dhevanaayiraamal, Malaigalin Dhevanaayirukkiraar Endru Seeriyar Solliyirukkirapadiyinaal, Naan Indha Eraalamaana Janakkoottaththaiyellaam Un Kaiyil Oppukkoduththen; Adhinaal Naane Karththar Endru Neengal Ariveergal Endru Karththar Sollugiraar Endraan.
29 ezhunaalalavum Avargal Mugamugamaaip Paalayamirangiyirundhaargal; Ezhaam Naalil Yuththam Kalandhu, Isravel Puththirar Orenaalile Seeriyaril Latcham Kaalaatkalai Madangadiththaargal.

30 meedhiyaanavargal Aappek Pattanaththirkul Odipponaargal; Ange Meedhiyaayirundha Irubaththezhaayiramperin Mel Alangam Idindhu Vizhundhadhu; Benaadhaaththum Odippoi Nagaraththirkul Pugundhu, Ullaraiyile Padhunginaan.

31 appozhudhu Avan Oozhiyakkaarar Avanai Nokki: Idho, Isravel Vamsaththu Raajaakkal Thayavulla Raajaakkal Endru Kettirukkirom; Naangal Rattugalai Engal Araigalil Katti, Kayirugalai Engal Thalaigalil Sutrik Kondu, Isravelin Raajaavinidaththil Povom; Oruvelai Ummai Uyirode Vaippaar Endru Solli,

32 irattaith Thangal Araigalil Katti, Kayirugalaith Thangal Thalaigalil Sutrikkondu, Isravelin Raajaavinidaththil Vandhu: Ennai Uyirodevaiyum Endru Umadhu Adiyaanaagiya Benaadhaadh Vinnappampannugiraan Endraargal. Adharku Avan, Innum Avan Uyirode Irukkiraanaa, Avan En Sagodharan Endraan.

33 andha Manushar Nandraaik Gavaniththu, Avan Vaayin Sollai Udane Pidiththu: Umadhu Sagodharanaagiya Benaadhaadh Irukkiraan Endraargal; Appozhudhu Avan: Neengal Poi, Avanai Azhaiththukkonduvaarungal Endraan; Benaadhaadh
